DOC.brief_summary: This is a trial of screening for ALOA-IgG AtheroAbzyme Test comparing healthy, asymptomatic myocardial ischemic and acute coronary syndrome patients.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Screening for ALOA-IgG AtheroAbzyme Test
DOC.criteria: Healthy patients High Risk patients or Asymptomatic myocardial Ischemic patients Acute Coronary Syndrome patients
DOC.keyword: Determination of the level of oxidised LDL by measuring the level of IgG in Blood
